ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.configuration

Class ConfigurationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.configuration.ConfigurationController

  • public class ConfigurationController
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigurationController is a controller for the Configuration model. This class is responsible for providing an abstraction for event handlers setup by the view.
